response.original_title: A miracle at the end of the year, where I thoroughly fucked AV actress ‘Kawakita Saika’, my girlfriend’s best friend
response.overview: Hajime has a girlfriend whose best friend is Saika Kawakita, a well-known AV actress. He has a crush on her and even masturbates to her videos, but that’s pretty much it.  However, the situation takes a wild turn after his girlfriend cheats on him, and Saika feeling pity for him reaches out and gets closer to him.  Good stuff.
